roleset.name: elevated or high in appearance or character
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Another thing that makes up a good leader is nobility because if he is noble to the countrymen, then there would not be any disputes within the country

example.name: concatenation (and odd sentence)
example.text: He is noble to get the job done quickly.

roleset.name: impossing, impressive
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. Framed by Katie.

example.name: only arg
example.text: A severe-looking policeman sat astride a noble horse.
